advancedmarketplace_set_expiry_date_desc: Select expired date for the listing.
instant_payment_description: If you enable this option, buyers can make a payment to one of the payment gateways you have on file with us.
advancedmarketplace_save_as_draft_tips: Tips: After this listing was published, you can upload more photos and send invitations to reach more buyers.
payment_method_is_required: This option is required if you enable Instant Payment.
